MediFinder

UX Strategy • SaaS Design

Experience & Roles

Every role added a new layer to how I understand users, teams, and impact.

Let’s add your project to this story
Nov 2022 – Aug 2025

UX/UI Designer — XLoop Digital Pvt Ltd

Led the end-to-end UX process for web and mobile products, developing scalable design systems and improving usability across platforms.

  • Conducted user research (interviews, surveys, usability testing) to guide design decisions.
  • Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups in Figma.
  • Collaborated with developers and product managers for smooth implementation.
  • Performed UX audits and heuristic evaluations to enhance satisfaction.
  • Designed and executed A/B tests to validate design improvements.
  • Advocated accessibility and usability best practices across the team.
Jan 2022 – Present (Part time)

Global Evaluator — Fab Foundation

Evaluated and mentored global students in digital fabrication, ensuring project quality and alignment with Fab Academy’s international standards.

  • Reviewed weekly assignments and final projects from China, Singapore, and the Philippines.
  • Delivered structured feedback and technical mentorship.
  • Maintained global consistency in evaluations and documentation.
  • Encouraged systems thinking and user-centered problem solving.
Feb 2022 – Dec 2022

Systems Engineer — Film City Department, Express Media Publications

Managed 3D printing systems and rapid prototyping workflows for media production.

  • Operated FDM, SLA, and SLS printers for high-precision fabrication.
  • Optimized 3D models and slicing parameters for print quality.
  • Ensured reliability through regular maintenance and calibration.
  • Collaborated with designers to improve manufacturability.
Aug 2018 – Feb 2022

Instructor & Lab Manager — Fab Lab Khairpur, Sukkur IBA University

Directed lab operations and led hands-on programs in digital fabrication and design thinking.

  • Delivered and co-developed the Fab Diploma Program for three cohorts.
  • Managed CAD/CAM tools, machine upkeep, and materials.
  • Conducted STEAM workshops and mentoring sessions.
  • Oversaw client projects, guiding teams through prototyping and iteration.
  • Hosted international delegations and promoted innovation outreach.
Jan 2017 – Jan 2018

Space Manager & Coordinator — Fab Lab Tajurbagah / Ejaad Tech (Pvt.) Ltd.

Coordinated fabrication lab operations, workshops, and training programs.

  • Managed day-to-day lab activities and user experience within the space.
  • Conducted workshops on 3D design, printing, and Arduino prototyping.
  • Created learning content and improved spatial usability.
  • Supported user projects through feedback-driven design processes.
